description.en-US: This extension will not support Thunderbird3 because Thunderbird3's account wizard supports Gmail IMAP. Add Gmail IMAP options to the account setup wizard. You can easily setup Gmail IMAP account from the wizard. Choose the "Gmail IMAP" to set up Gmail's imap access; "Gmail IMAP (Google Apps)" for a Google Apps' custom address. This extension setup the following: * create new account * set up SMTP server * synchronize draft, sent, spam, starred and trash folders * set up some options to improve the performance of Thunderbird The settings above are based on a Google's recommended setting. Please refer to the following for details: http://mail.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=78892&topic=12761&hl=en# Please note that synchronizing special folders will fails if Gmail and Thunderbird use different language or your locale is not included in the package. Please refer to the following for supported locales: http://hogiblog.blogspot.com/2007/11/call-for-translation.html I've developed another extension that synchronizes Google Contacts and Thunderbird address books, which is named "Google Contacts". I believe this will make your Gmail IMAP more convenient. Please try it too! You can download it from following sites: * AMO https://addons.mozilla.org/ja/thunderbird/addon/7307 * my homepage http://hogi.a.orn.jp/en/
description.de: This extension will not support Thunderbird3 because Thunderbird3's account wizard supports Google Mail IMAP. Add Google Mail IMAP options to the account setup wizard. You can easily setup Google Mail IMAP account from the wizard. Choose the "Google Mail IMAP" to set up Google Mail's imap access; "Google Mail IMAP (Google Apps)" for a Google Apps' custom address. This extension setup the following: * create new account * set up SMTP server * synchronize draft, sent, spam, starred and trash folders * set up some options to improve the performance of Thunderbird The settings above are based on a Google's recommended setting. Please refer to the following for details: http://mail.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=78892&topic=12761&hl=en# Please note that synchronizing special folders will fails if Google Mail and Thunderbird use different language or your locale is not included in the package. Please refer to the following for supported locales: http://hogiblog.blogspot.com/2007/11/call-for-translation.html I've developed another extension that synchronizes Google Contacts and Thunderbird address books, which is named "Google Contacts". I believe this will make your Google Mail IMAP more convenient. Please try it too! You can download it from following sites: * AMO https://addons.mozilla.org/ja/thunderbird/addon/7307 * my homepage http://hogi.a.orn.jp/en/
description.es: Añade la opción de Gmail IMAP al asistente de cuentas. Puede configurar fácilmente una cuenta Gmail IMAP desde el asistente. Seleccione la opción "Gmail IMAP" para configurar el acceso imap de Gmail; "Gmail IMAP (Aplicaciones Google" para una cuenta de este tipo. Esta extensión realiza las siguientes acciones: * crea la nueva cuenta * configura el servidor SMTP * sincroniza las carpetas de borradores, enviados, spam, destacados y papelera * ajusta varias opciones para mejorar el rendimiento de Thunderbird Los ajustes están basados en las recomendaciones de Google. Consulte el siguiente enlace para más información: http://mail.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?answer=78892&topic=12761&hl=en# Tenga en cuenta que la sincronización entre las carpetas especiales puede fallar si Gmail y Thunderbird usan idiomas diferentes o su idioma no está incluido en el paquete. Consulte el siguiente enlace para ver los idiomas incluidos: http://hogiblog.blogspot.com/2007/11/call-for-translation.html He creado otra extensión que sincroniza los contactos de Google y las libretas de direcciones de Thunderbird, llamada "Google Contacts". Creo que con ella podrá usar Gmail IMAP de un mejor modo. Por favor, pruébela. Puede descargarla desde los siguientes sitios: * AMO https://addons.mozilla.org/ja/thunderbird/addon/7307 * mi página web http://hogi.a.orn.jp/en/

summary.en-US: Add Gmail IMAP options to the account wizard. You can easily set up Gmail IMAP by this extension.
summary.de: Add Google Mail IMAP options to the account wizard. You can easily set up Google Mail IMAP by this extension.
summary.es: Añade la opción de Gmail IMAP al asistente de cuentas. Puede configurar fácilmente una cuenta Gmail IMAP usando esta extensión.
